LanguageData.Stonecutting.description: Cut rock chunks into stone blocks for use in construction. Build beautiful stone tile floors or conk creet walkways baybee.
LanguageData.Stonecutting.label: stonecutting and conk creet baybee
LanguageData.NutrientPaste.label: gamer slop
LanguageData.NutrientPaste.description: Build gamer slop dispensers which efficiently produce edible meals from raw nutritive feedstocks, while requiring no labor at all.
